name: yVaultPrizePoolProxyFactory
description: yVault Prize Pool Proxy Factory. Minimal proxy pattern for creating new yVault Prize Pools.

eventDecorators.name: ProxyCreated
eventDecorators.description: To call when there is consensus on final result. Emitted when a user withdraws tokens.

functionDecorators.name: create
functionDecorators.description: Creates a new yVault Prize Pool as a proxy of the template instance.

returnDecorators.description: A reference to the new proxied yVault Prize Pool.

functionDecorators.name: instance
functionDecorators.description: Contract template for deploying proxied Prize Pools.
